head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MEGALI, P. RICHARD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MEGALI, P. RICHARD

block.p: MEGALI-P. Richard. On May 18, 2000. Retired attorney. Beloved husband of the late Victoria. Loving brother of Marie and brotherin-law of Mary. Dear uncle of Joanne Druery and Philip Megali. Great-uncle of Bart Druery IV, Danielle Duplin, Christina Megali, Brian Megali and Laura Megali. Reposing at Dennis S. O'Connor Funeral Home, 91-05 Beach Channel Dr, Rockaway Beach, NY. Mass of Christian Burial on Wednesday, 10 AM, at St. Edmund's Church, Breezy Point. Interment St. Raymond's Cemetery. Visiting Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM.
